thread.title: Watch the Duo Behind Chance the Rapper’s “No Problem” in Action
thread.title_full: Watch the Duo Behind Chance the Rapper’s “No Problem” in Action

author: Bianca Giulione
title: Watch the Duo Behind Chance the Rapper’s “No Problem” in Action
text:
They allegedly only started making music two years ago, but production duo BrassTracks already have a certified hit, thanks to their work on Chance the Rapper ‘s massively successful “No Problem.” Check them out in the above video, as they take us through their process in creating the lead single off Chance’s third mixtape Coloring Book , which also features Lil Wayne and 2 Chainz. You can also catch a glimpse of their studio setup as they deconstruct the elements used in the track – bass guitar (the real deal), piano, and of course those killer choir vocals!
What’s happening in the world of Chance? He recently donated $1 million USD to Chicago schools , will be headlining Essence Festival in New Orleans, and probably has a collab with Future in the works.
Revisit the joyous visual for “No Problem” below.

In other music news, delete your Tinder and head to Snapchat instead – Action Bronson is going to help you find love on his new dating show. Get the full scoop here .
